Welcome!

Mobile Budget VP is a helper application for Personal Budget VP desktop application.

Mobile Budget VP lets you have your expenses plans on your mobile device and register your expenses anywhere you are.

For exchanging data with your Personal Budget VP you will need only your home WiFi network.

If you\'re not a user of Personal Budget VP application, please, visit our site first

http://www.pbudgetvp.com

So, tap the Start button and make your life easier with Mobile Budget VP.
